nodes.bodyText: @iambmelt - Am a bit concerned about using ROOT here instead of US which appears to be what we did for the rest of caching.  What are your thoughts?

https://cs.android.com/android/platform/superproject/+/master:libcore/libart/src/main/java/java/lang/CaseMapper.java;drc=master;l=45 it looks like there are a few cases where the Locale matters - Turkish, Lithuanian, and Azerbaijani.  Other than those and a few special cases it shouldn't matter.
This was the actual reported bug.
